name: Stay at Home (itch) (DeveloperMode)
description:
It is a point and clicking game and a mini story about a girl in the middle of a pandemic lockdown being trapped in her own house alone. Find her a way to get out of the house by interacting the environment of the interiors of the house.

This is based from a game jam activity from itch.io (https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-27/rate/829421)

Controls:- escape for pause- mouse click for interaction- press space, enter, and enter keypad when reading to the next dialog.

I hope you enjoy :D #pointnclick #textadventure
